de.ityx.mediatrix.data

Class Campaign

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ityx.mediatrix.data.ErpsData
      • de.ityx.mediatrix.data.Campaign
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IErpsData, Serializable

    public class Campaign
extends ErpsData
    Show the statistic data of the campaigns sent to the customers. The campaigns are the mails sent to the customers and logs the customer activities(e.g. if the mail was viewed).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
    was:
    Kampagne
